quoteText: THEREFORE, BY USING THE VUDU COMMUNITY FEATURE AND ALL RELATED FEATURES, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT YOU ARE CONSENTING TO THE RELEASE OF INFORMATION ABOUT YOU TO A PUBLIC FORUM, INCLUDING OTHER MEMBERS OF THE VUDU COMMUNITY, USERS OF THE VUDU SERVICE AND OTHER VISITORS TO THE VUDU WEBSITE.
title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
